nodes.description: 巴基斯坦俾路支省开始疫苗接种活动，袭击发生时为第三天
nodes.support_text: The attack came on the third day of a vaccination campaign in the province of Baluchistan, of which Quetta is the capital.

nodes.description: 警察在奎达市脊髓灰质炎疫苗接种中心外驻守，保护接种工作人员
nodes.support_text: He said the officers were there to guard polio workers, who are often targeted by Islamist militants in Pakistan.

nodes.description: 一名自杀式炸弹袭击者走向警察
nodes.support_text: The bomber, who was also killed, walked up to police officers and detonated what Mr. Shah said amounted to more than 20 pounds of explosives.

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击者引爆了超过20磅的炸药
nodes.support_text: The bomber, who was also killed, walked up to police officers and detonated what Mr. Shah said amounted to more than 20 pounds of explosives.

nodes.description: 袭击导致至少16人死亡，包括13名警察、2名平民和1名准军事警察
nodes.support_text: At least 16 people were killed on Wednesday in a suicide bombing outside a polio vaccination center in the southwestern Pakistani city of Quetta, officials and witnesses said. Thirteen of the victims were police officers, said Syed Imtiaz Shah, a senior official with the Quetta police.

nodes.description: 袭击还导致10名警察和9名平民受伤
nodes.support_text: Two civilians and a paramilitary police officer were also killed, and 10 police officers and nine civilians were wounded.

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击者本人也在袭击中死亡
nodes.support_text: The bomber, who was also killed, walked up to police officers and detonated what Mr. Shah said amounted to more than 20 pounds of explosives.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦塔利班发言人穆罕默德·库拉萨尼代表该组织声称对此次袭击负责
nodes.support_text: A spokesman for the Pakistani Taliban, Muhammad Khurrasani, claimed responsibility for the attack on the militants' behalf.

nodes.description: 官员和目击者报告了导致至少16人死亡的自杀式炸弹袭击事件
nodes.support_text: At least 16 people were killed on Wednesday in a suicide bombing outside a polio vaccination center in the southwestern Pakistani city of Quetta, officials and witnesses said.

nodes.description: Syed Imtiaz Shah说十三名受害者是警察
nodes.support_text: Thirteen of the victims were police officers, said Syed Imtiaz Shah, a senior official with the Quetta police.

nodes.description: Syed Imtiaz Shah说警察在那里是为了保护脊髓灰质炎工作者
nodes.support_text: He said the officers were there to guard polio workers, who are often targeted by Islamist militants in Pakistan.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦的伊斯兰武装分子针对脊髓灰质炎工作者
nodes.support_text: He said the officers were there to guard polio workers, who are often targeted by Islamist militants in Pakistan.

nodes.description: Shah先生说爆炸物相当于超过20磅
nodes.support_text: The bomber, who was also killed, walked up to police officers and detonated what Mr. Shah said amounted to more than 20 pounds of explosives.
